posts.Note: SAP S/4HANA is a comprehensive ERP solution with a strong focus on manufacturing and retail industries, offering deep integration with Netsuite and Salesforce, a range of advanced features, and high customization capabilities.

Oracle NetSuite is a popular ERP solution designed for mid-sized to large enterprises, offering robust integrations with Salesforce, a wide range of core and advanced features, and strong customization options.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a comprehensive ERP solution with a focus on manufacturing and retail industries, featuring tight integration with both Netsuite and Salesforce, a rich set of core and advanced features, and high levels of customization.

Acumatica Cloud ERP is a cloud-based ERP solution tailored for small to mid-sized businesses, offering strong integrations with Netsuite and Salesforce, a comprehensive set of core and advanced features, and flexible customization options.
